spec_data.Name: perl-Tk-Getopt
spec_data.Description:
Tk::Getopt provides an interface to access command line options via
Getopt::Long and editing with a graphical user interface via a Tk window.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:40:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: User configuration window for Tk with interface to Getopt::Long
